common 模块

Common components shared across HABIT modules.

ServiceConfigurator 类

class habit.core.common.service_configurator.ServiceConfigurator(config: Any, logger: Any | None = None, output_dir: str | None = None)[源代码]

基类：object

Unified service configurator.

Responsible for creating and configuring all services with their dependencies. Use this class instead of direct instantiation of complex workflow classes.

示例

```python configurator = ServiceConfigurator(config)

# Create fully configured services comparison = configurator.create_model_comparison() habitat_analysis = configurator.create_habitat_analysis() ```

__init__(config: Any, logger: Any | None = None, output_dir: str | None = None)[源代码]

Initialize ServiceConfigurator.

参数:

  • config – Configuration object or dictionary.

  • logger – Logger instance (will be created if not provided).

  • output_dir – Output directory (will be derived from config if not provided).

create_model_comparison(config: Any | None = None, output_dir: str | None = None) → ModelComparison[源代码]

Create fully configured ModelComparison instance.

参数:

  • output_dir – Output directory (uses configurator’s output_dir if not provided).

返回:

Configured ModelComparison instance.

参数:

name – Service name.

返回:
